name: Disney's Peter Pan: Return to Never Land
name_original: Disney's Peter Pan: Return to Never Land
description:
Peter Pan in Disney's Return to Neverland
Journey across Never Land and believe in the power of make-believe!
Open a new chapter in Walt Disney's masterpiece, Peter Pan in Return to Never Land. Captain Hook is up to his old tricks and it's up to you to help Peter Pan and Tinker Bell in this high-flying adventure! All it takes is faith, trust... and a little pixie dust!
Play as Peter Pan or Tinker Bell! Enjoy action, puzzles and tons of fun-filled adventure... but the fun doesn't stop there! Master the art of flying, fighting, weapons, Panpipes, Pixie Dust and magic. And be sure to explore every nook and cranny for Bonus areas and hidden levels.
It's great to be a kid!
